abstract: Javier Fernandez of Spain retains world figure skating title in Boston with comeback in long program.
snippet: Spain’s Javier Fernández successfully defended his world figure skating title in Boston, turning a daunting deficit into a lopsided victory when he skated flawlessly and Yuzuru Hanyu struggled in the long program.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s Javier Fernández successfully defended his world figure skating title in Boston, turning a daunting deficit into a lopsided victory when he skated flawlessly and Yuzuru Hanyu struggled in the long program.
